publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-675 Ms Sandra White: The Symphony of Dreams Trust-That the Parliament congratulates the Symphony of Dreams Trust for the good work it has been doing in Glasgow; notes that the trust was created to help fulfil the musical dreams of people who are chronically sick, disabled or who suffer from the effects of poverty, and wishes continued success to the trust in its activities such as encouraging people to achieve their musical aspirations by giving them a chance to hear, feel, see and create music.
S2M-675 The Symphony of Dreams Trust (lodged on 27 November 2003) Christine Grahame*
S2M-675 The Symphony of Dreams Trust (lodged on 27 November 2003) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, John Swinburne*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-675 The Symphony of Dreams Trust (lodged on 27 November 2003) Alex Neil*
